players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Sad to see Diana gone so early. I think we should focus on finding who among us is the detective before making any rash moves."
Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso. We need to act quickly to prevent him from killing again."
You: "I'm a villager. It's too early to accuse anyone definitively. We need more information."
Bob: "Charlie, your quick accusation seems suspicious to me. Why so eager to blame me without evidence? Maybe you're trying to divert attention from yourself."

You: "Charlie's accusation of Bob is very direct, but it's only Day 1. We have no real evidence yet. I'm a villager, and I'm trying to figure things out too. Let's not rush into eliminating someone without more..."
Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso. I have solid proof from my investigation last night. If we hesitate, he will kill again tonight. We must vote him out now to protect the town."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Bob

Night 1 begins.

Day 1 begins.

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Sad to see Diana gone so early. I think we should focus on finding who among us is the detective before making any rash moves."
You: "Bob is the mafioso. We need to act quickly to prevent him from killing again."
Alice: "I'm a villager. It's too early to accuse anyone definitively. We need more information."
Bob: "Charlie, your quick accusation seems suspicious to me. Why so eager to blame me without evidence? Maybe you're trying to divert attention from yourself."

Alice: "Charlie's accusation of Bob is very direct, but it's only Day 1. We have no real evidence yet. I'm a villager, and I'm trying to figure things out too. Let's not rush into eliminating someone without more..."
You: "Bob is the mafioso. I have solid proof from my investigation last night. If we hesitate, he will kill again tonight. We must vote him out now to protect the town."

Day 1 begins.
